categories: Category:Victory-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Pestage was a Victory-class Star Destroyer that served in the Imperial Navy during the height of the Galactic Civil War.

In response to a number of Rebel attacks in the Outer Rim against various hydrocarbon processing facilities, the Empire decided to subjugate the planet of Kheedar to protect its hydrocarbon resources. The Pestage was dispatched to Kheedar, and its stormtroopers and TIE/LN starfighters proceeded to invade the planet.
